resources.string: Total nicks (%1$d) should be a multiple of major nick interval (%2$d). Scale may be distorted.
Sum of min (%1$f) and max (%2$f) should be divisible by 2. Scale may be distorted.
Sum of min (%1$f) and max (%2$f) should be a multiple of value per nick (%3$f). Scale may be distorted.
